name: Better Call Saul Kart
description:
Join Saul Goodman and his friends in this high speed wacky kart racing game. Big Trash Games promises that this is indeed a video game that can be played by humans.

Features

  • 3 courses to race on
  • 8 Characters to play as
  • Items
  • An unlockable special cutscene if you get 1st place on each course
  • "Good Graphics" (according to the lead artist)

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space Bar - Throw Item Forward
  • CTRL - Throw Item Backward
